ARABIC: رَّبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقِ وَٱلْمَغْرِبِ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَٱتَّخِذْهُ وَكِيلًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Lord of the East and West - there is no god but Him - so take Him as your Guardian.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He is the Lord of the East and the West. There is no god but He. So take Him alone as your protector.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He is the Lord of the East and the West; there is no god but He. So take Him alone for your Guardian,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He is the only Lord, so choose Him as your guardian.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Lord of the East and Lord of the West – there is no God except Him, therefore make Him your sole Trustee of affairs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Lord of the east and the west; La ilaha illa Huwa, so take Him as a trustee.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: The Lord of the East and the West-- there is no god but He-- therefore take Him for a protector.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Lord of the East and the West; there is no god but He; so take Him for a Guardian.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lord of the East and the West; there is no Allah save Him; so choose thou Him alone for thy defender -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He is the Lord of the east and the west, there is no deity but Him, so take Him as your Guardian.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Lord of the east and the west! No God is there but He! Wherefore take Him for thy trustee.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Lord of the east and the west, there is no god except Him; so take Him for your trustee,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (He is) Lord of the East and the West: there is no god but He: take Him therefore for (thy) Disposer of Affairs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (He Alone is) the Lord of the east and the west, La ilaha illa Huwa (none has the right to be worshipped but He). So take Him Alone as Wakil (Disposer of your affairs).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He is the Lord of the East and the West; there is no god except Him. Take Him for your Guardian.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Lord of the East and the West. There is no god but He, so take Him as a Trustee.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [He is] the Lord of the East and the West; there is no deity except Him, so take Him as Disposer of [your] affairs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [73:9] He is, Lord of the east and the west; there is no god except Him, so take Him for a Guardian, entrusting your affairs to Him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lord of the East and the West) is Allah; (there is no God save Him; so choose you Him alone for thy defender) worship Him as a Lord; it is also said this means: take Him as a Guardian regarding that which He promised you of help, supremacy and reward.
